channel.title: Joel García -> IXACHI
channel.description: Hello, I just wanted to announce here that I have rebranded from Joel García to IXACHI hehe. You can find me as IXACHI on Instagram, Twitter, YouTube and SoundCloud. The reason I rebranded is because I've always wanted to make electronic (as in dubstep and electro-house) music, but as Joel García I made a bunch of actual pop songs with vocals, such as my track "Us Two", I didn't think the electronic genre really fit the audience I was targeting to. So I decided to start all over again as IXACHI, which actually means "great" in Nahuatl, which is a native Mexican word (I'm Mexican). I just wanted to let you know I'm the same person hehe. Good day everyone!

item.title: Joel García -> IXACHI
item.dc:creator: joelgarcia
item.description:
Hello, I just wanted to announce here that I have rebranded from Joel García to IXACHI hehe. You can find me as IXACHI on Instagram, Twitter, YouTube and SoundCloud. The reason I rebranded is because I’ve always wanted to make electronic (as in dubstep and electro-house) music, but as Joel García I made a bunch of actual pop songs with vocals, such as my track “Us Two”, I didn’t think the electronic genre really fit the audience I was targeting to. So I decided to start all over again as IXACHI, which actually means “great” in Nahuatl, which is a native Mexican word (I’m Mexican). I just wanted to let you know I’m the same person hehe. Good day everyone!

Read full topic
